name: Philosophy of Religion
description: A philosophical analysis of some basic theological questions; the nature of religious belief and experience, the relationship between religion and morality, or religion and science, the role of religion in a pluralistic society. [36L]
prerequisites: PHL101H5/ PHL102H5/ PHL103H5/ PHL105Y5/ PHL113H5 (may be taken as a corequisite) or 4.0 credits.
